description:
This plugin has been recently acquired by Zeroqode - please bear with us while we review the code and make improvements/fixes where necessary.

Changes the character the user typed to something else at the exact moment the user types it (on the fly).
For example the user types "a" and what appears is "b". One use case is swapping dots with commas or the other way around in number inputs.

To receive special offers and important updates please visit: https://zeroqo.de/updates

name: Instant value replacer
plugin_instructions: With the target input visible (loaded by Bubble), use the action "Set replacer", put the input ID, old character and new character.
